milestone.description: Implement background processes to update current location/tweets.

issue.body:
Implemented methods to determine changes in updated tweet set (TweetUtils) and determine whether a significant enough distance has been covered to warrant a new API request to Twitter (LocationUtils).

Address #35 .

issue.title: Tweet update service and foreground process

milestone.title: Background Location Updates
milestone.description: Implement background processes to update current location/tweets.

issue.body:
Many changes: 
- Implemented a service (TweetUpdateService) running in a HandlerThread to acquire regular location updates and make requests to the Twitter API, when appropriate. This service uses LocalBroadcastManager to inform registered receivers of changes.
- Refactor FeedActivity and GoogleMapsActivity to bind this service, and register as BroadcastReceivers for tweet updates.
- Refactored TweetUpdateService to run as foreground service when no activities are bound, and the user has chosen to have tweet tracking turned on.
- Added several utility classes to help better organize code.

issue.title: Add sign out option to user drop down menu

milestone.title: User Preferences
milestone.description:
Add user preferences to adjust settings:

1) Radius
2) Filter by: (ex. popular, etc.)
3) Sign out/change account

Also, add option to stay signed in on login screen.

issue.body: Add ability to sign out from app(/Twitter?) from the drop down menu.
